name: @example/scenegraph-pan-zoom
description: Basic 2D scenegraph example with pan/zoom functionality
author: Karsten Schmidt <k+npm@thi.ng>

scripts.css:watch: ../../node_modules/.bin/metacss develop --bundle --watch --pretty --out-specs css/framework.json --out-css css/style.css --force @css/includes.txt ../../packages/meta-css/specs/*.mcss.json css/*.mcss.json css/*.mcss src/*.mcss
scripts.css:build: ../../node_modules/.bin/metacss develop --bundle --out-specs css/framework.json --out-css css/style.css --force @css/includes.txt ../../packages/meta-css/specs/*.mcss.json css/*.mcss.json css/*.mcss src/*.mcss
